price: Ec me kujdes e i përmbajtur dhe fol me zë të ulët; se zëri më i vrazhdë është zëri i gomarit”!
arabic: وَٱقۡصِدۡ فِي مَشۡيِكَ وَٱغۡضُضۡ مِن صَوۡتِكَۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلۡأَصۡوَٰتِ لَصَوۡتُ ٱلۡحَمِيرِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wa-iq'ṣid fī mashyika wa-ugh'ḍuḍ min ṣawtika inna ankara al-aṣwāti laṣawtu al-ḥamīri
